page.title: 05Coombe Hill Traffic Survey.
page.content: On June 19th 1985 at 1.45 p.m we started a traffic survey of the A38 and A4019, Coombe Hill T Junction.we finished our survey at 2.00 p.m. According to our records,there were 28 cars,we also recorded 5 lorries,1 motorcycle and 10 vans. These vehicles were coming from the South along the A38. The vehicles coming from the North of England on the A38 added up to 43 cars,3 lorries,2 coaches and 8 vans. 37 cars,4 lorries and 2 vans came in from the A38 to join the A4109. The whole survey amounts upto 152 vehicles,this gives us an hourly rate of 176 vehicles per hour passing through the Junction.
